alert.note: Alert for Chouteau (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:10PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Chouteau County through 700 PM MDT... At 610 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Fort Benton to near Geraldine. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Benton, Geraldine, Carter, Shonkin, Loma, Square Butte and Iliad. This includes Highway 87 between mile markers 24 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
